summary: Simple fix to remove that ugly burnt texture applyed to the character's face when turned into a vampire.
descriptionHtml:
[Updates]
Hey guys, sorry I haven't updated this in a looong time
[Description]
Dec/13/2011 - V1.0
Simple fix to remove that ugly burnt texture applied to the character's face when turned into a vampire.
This will effect other NPC vampires as well as all characters using dirt face textures.

[Install]
Place data folder into Skyrim directory. Overwrite files when prompted.

[Uninstall]
Delete files added by this mod.

[Contact]
Fatalmasterpiece on http://www.thenexusforums.com/
File found at http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1148
author: Fatalmasterpiece
